thread.section_title: Select Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great hotel in perfect location
thread.title_full: Great hotel in perfect location - Review of Select Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: StMark007
title: Great hotel in perfect location
text:
What a great hotel!
A lovely welcome from friendly and multi-lingual reception staff.
The room has so much character, exposed wood beams and stonework and yet contemporary. Also a good size for Paris.
Breakfast was lovely, a good choice of typical continental pastries and also cooked options.
The location is ideal if you like to be central but away from the busiest tourist areas.
Plenty of restaurants and bars in the area.
We will be back.
